summary: This document is a Certificate of Incorporation for JEGE, Inc., filed in the State of Delaware. It outlines the corporation's name, registered office, purpose, stock structure, and the responsibilities of its board of directors, including limitations on personal liability for directors.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is named as the sole incorporator of JEGE, Inc., responsible for filing the Certificate of Incorporation.

persons.name: J. Epstein
persons.context: J. Epstein is mentioned in the context of the document's transmission but does not have a direct role in the incorporation process.

locations: 1209 Orange Street, Wilmington, New Castle County, Delaware
457 Madison Avenue, Fourth Floor, New York, New York 10022
keyFacts: The corporation is named JEGE, Inc.
Darren Indyke is the sole incorporator of the corporation.
The registered office of the corporation is located at 1209 Orange Street, Wilmington, Delaware.
The corporation is authorized to issue 1,500 shares of common stock without par value.
The document outlines limitations on the personal liability of directors.
